channel.title: [PI] Portal Menu's

item.title: [PI] Portal Menu's
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

You would use it such as something simular to sending dialouge, than set the individual clicking buttons for it as seen in your case 9192.

case 50235: //<-- Clicking Button Id's. case 4140: case 117112: c.getDH().sendOption5("Rock Crabs", "Taverly Dungeon", "Slayer Tower", "Brimhaven Dungeon", "Moss Giants"); c.teleAction = 1; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Portal Menu's
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:414605”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=516568.msg3750066#msg3750066 date=1315959935]
/*
txt here
*/

Means it’s notes. It will not compile that.
It’s the same as using //, except when you have a lot to // you use /* */.
[/quote]
No shit… That was an example I am using, I disabled it for a reason, just how do I make a menu like the above code?[/quote]
Since you decided to be a dumbass, and just get mad at him, then i’m not helping. Look at my tutorial and figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Portal Menu's
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Well I am trying to add Menus to Portals(Like where there is more than one choice), and well I tried the code used for spell teleports: /*case 9192: if (c.teleAction == 1) { //slayer tower c.getPA().spellTeleport(3428, 3537, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 2) { //tzhaar c.getPA().spellTeleport(2444, 5170, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //dag kings c.getPA().spellTeleport(2479, 10147, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 4) { //44 portals c.getPA().spellTeleport(2975, 3873, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 5) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2813,3436,0); } if (c.dialogueAction == 10) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2713, 4836, 0); c.dialogueAction = -1; } else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2162, 4833, 0); c.dialogueAction = -1; } else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2207, 4836, 0); c.dialogueAction = -1; } break;*/
But I tried entering that into my action handler class and it did not work, any ideas on how to make the menu’s?

Read full topic
